Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM

This list contains 4262 Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM in India. This price list was last updated on Sep 18, 2025.

Top 3 Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM are as follows:
  1. Oppo F31 Pro 5G: Octa Core, 8 GB RAM, 50 MP + 2 MP Dual Rear & 32 MP Front Camera, 7000 mAh Battery with 80W Fast Charging, 2.5 GHz Processor
  2. Oppo F31 Pro Plus 5G: Wi-Fi, Snapdragon 7 Gen3, 5G, 256 GB inbuilt, VoLTE
  3. Oppo F31 5G: 8 GB RAM, Wi-Fi, 5G, 1080 x 2412 px, 50 MP + 2 MP Dual Rear & 16 MP Front Camera
